steps.title: Boil water in a saucepan.
steps.content: Boil water in a saucepan. Bring the water to a full boil. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Add the Pili nuts to the boiling water.
steps.content: Add the Pili nuts to the boiling water. [3] X Research source When the skin of the Pili nuts starts to peel off, stop the cooking process.

steps.title: Remove all of the Pili from the water.
steps.content: Remove all of the Pili from the water.

steps.title: Remove the skins from the nuts.
steps.content: Remove the skins from the nuts. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Add vegetable oil to a clean saucepan.
steps.content: Add vegetable oil to a clean saucepan.

steps.title: Fry the Pili nuts.
steps.content: Fry the Pili nuts. Be sure to constantly stir the nuts while frying.

steps.title: Add sugar when the Pili nuts are golden brown.
steps.content: Add sugar when the Pili nuts are golden brown.

steps.title: Caramelize the sugar.
steps.content: Caramelize the sugar. Allow the caramelized sugar to coat the nuts. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Remove the Pili nuts from the heat.
steps.content: Remove the Pili nuts from the heat. Be sure they're coated in the caramelized sugar evenly and thoroughly!
